title: Do you know roughly when the visible damages or marks appeared on the codicils?
question: Do you know roughly when the visible damages or marks appeared on the codicils?
date: Date of roughly when the damages or marks happened to the codicils
dateHint:
Date of roughly when the damages or marks happened to the codicils
If you cannot remember the full date, enter just the year

codicilsDamageDateKnown.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know roughly when the visible damages or marks appeared on the codicils

codicilsdamagedate-year.required: Enter the year when damages or marks appeared on the codicils

codicilsdamagedate-month.required: Please enter the month if you know the day it was damaged

codicilsdamagedate.future: The date of when damages or marks appeared on the codicils must be in the past or today
